ygData.subject: Re: I'm a guide =D
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey, I ll move to San Diego!!!!  No wait I already live there.  Well anyway they pay $9.00/hour which isn t all that great compared to the cost of living in
ygData.messageBody:
Hey,
I'll move to San Diego!!!! No wait I already live there. Well
anyway they pay $9.00/hour which isn't all that great compared to the
cost of living in San Diego. Just to let you know.


Andy
Taren Barbarian Shaman,
Tuttun Halfling Cleric,
Mame Half Elf Druid,
Ocacius High Elf Cleric,
Kuvaren Half Elf Bard,
Tiramisu Dark Elf Mage
(All on Rodcet Nife)
*I need a life*

Sandy Collier wrote:

> From: "Sandy Collier" <sandycol@...>
>
> Ok....I'll move to San Diego! I WISH! (ROFL)
> Is there ANYONE on E'ci out there?
>
> Sandy
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Greg [mailto:grogers@...]
> Sent: Saturday, January 29, 2000 11:39 AM
> To: EQ_rainbow@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] I'm a guide =D
>
>
> From: "Greg" <grogers@...>
>
> Not to become a guide. I think you do to become a GM.
>
> Greg

> > > You don't have to live near Verant to be a guide. You just have
> to
> apply
> > > and be accepted. I'll let everyone know my guide name when I'm a
>
> guide,
> I
> > > won't give anyone any special treatment. I have to be an
> apprentice
> guide

> anyway
> =)
> > >
> > > Tina
> > >
> > > On Fri, 28 Jan 2000, Joseph J. Normandin wrote:
> > >
> > > > From: "Joseph J. Normandin" <josephn@...>
> > > >
> > > > If you are going ot be a GM on Rodcet you need to learn how to
> spell
> it
> > > > first! :) Rodcet Nife <----- heheheh not Rodcet Knife
> ehhehehe
> > > >
> > > > Seriously though, that is really cool i wisjh i lived in that
> area
> so
> i
> > culd
> > > > be a guide :) if we ahve issues in the game can we contac you
>
> > personally?
> > > > or is that a breach of ethics?
> > > >
> > > > good luck!
> > > >
> > > > -joe

> > > > ----- Original Message -----

> > > > >
> > > > > My guide application was accepted, and I've been selected to
> serve
> on
> > > > > Rodcet Knife. This was a wondeful surprise for me, as I
> know a
> lot
> of
> > > > people
> > > > > on this list play there. I won't be giving any preferential

> > > > > of course, but it will be nice to be able to say hi to you
> all =)
> > > > >
> > > > > My training is happening this Saturday, I'm not sure when
> I'll
> start
> > > > guiding.
> > > > >
> > > > > - Tina
